methods.name: new
title: Google
Cloud.new
methods.description:
Creates a new object for connecting to Google Cloud.

For more information on connecting to Google Cloud see the Authentication Guide.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud  = Google::Cloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore
pubsub  = gcloud.pubsub
storage = gcloud.storage

params.name: project
params.description:
Project identifier for the Pub/Sub service you are
connecting to.

params.name: keyfile
params.description:
Keyfile downloaded from Google Cloud. If
file path the file must be readable.

params.name: retries
params.description: Number of times to retry requests on server error. The default value is 3. Optional.

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default timeout to use in requests. Optional.
